Articles.Content:
Hello guys

I have installed the Mechjeb 2 mod and it seems to be working fine but when i try selecting a target for Mechjeb, Mechjeb doesnt recognize the target and keeps asking me to select a target
I switch to map view and try selecting the station or capsule but Mechjeb doesnt recognize the target.

What could i be doing wrong,do i need to upgrade anything. Thanks for the help guys

Hey @samir64, while I don't know exactly how to help you I can say that you will be able to find the best help in the thread for the mod. General rule is the best help will always be found in the thread for that particular mod. Drop a post here in this thread and I'm sure someone will be able to help you 

 

 

Edited February 27, 2016 by Glaran K'erman

AS Glaran said, wrong forum.

 

But.....  What are you trying to do?   There are multiple modules in MJ that require targets, not all work identical.
Mod related question moved over to Add-On Discussions.
